nom."},{"lineNumber":92055,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そうだ、美樹ちゃん。","translatedEnglishLine":"Oh yes, Miki-chan."},{"lineNumber":92056,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ご飯食べたら街の方に行ってみない？」","translatedEnglishLine":"After we finish eating, shall we go to the town?"},{"lineNumber":92057,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うん、行くー。","translatedEnglishLine":"Yeah, let's I already have enough, you know?"},{"lineNumber":92060,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うぅん、違うの違うの。","translatedEnglishLine":"No, no, that's not it."},{"lineNumber":92061,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ねずみさんのプリントされたタオルがあったの。","translatedEnglishLine":"There was a towel printed with a mouse."},{"lineNumber":92062,"originalJapaneseLine":"　そろそろ十二支揃うよ」","translatedEnglishLine":"I'm about to complete the whole zodiac set."},{"lineNumber":92063,"originalJapaneseLine":"「お、本当だ。","translatedEnglishLine":"Oh, really."},{"lineNumber":92064,"originalJapaneseLine":"　じゃあ絶対に買いに行かないと」","translatedEnglishLine":"Then I definitely have to go buy it."},{"lineNumber":92065,"originalJapaneseLine":"「二人とも、お喋りもいいですが、","translatedEnglishLine":"Both of you, chatting is fine, but"},{"lineNumber":92066,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ご飯が冷めてしまいますよ」","translatedEnglishLine":"your food will get cold."},{"lineNumber":92067,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、はーい」","translatedEnglishLine":"Ah, okay."},{"lineNumber":92068,"originalJapaneseLine":"「くすくす、楽しみだね」","translatedEnglishLine":"Hehe, looking forward to it."},{"lineNumber":92069,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うんっ、そうだね」","translatedEnglishLine":"Yeah, that's right."},{"lineNumber":92070,"originalJapaneseLine":"「まったく……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Good grief..."},{"lineNumber":92071,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"......"},{"lineNumber":92072,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Hmph..."},{"lineNumber":92073,"originalJapaneseLine":"美樹と健太郎の二人を見て、","translatedEnglishLine":"Looking at Miki and Kentarou,"},{"lineNumber":92074,"originalJapaneseLine":"そっと日光は口元を緩めていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Hikkou gently relaxed the corners of his mouth."},{"lineNumber":92075,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ほう……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Oh..."},{"lineNumber":92076,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うん？　どうしたの、ランス君」","translatedEnglishLine":"Hmm? What's the matter, Rance-kun?"},{"lineNumber":92077,"originalJapaneseLine":"「や、日光さんが優しい顔をしていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Well, Hikkou-san had a kind expression."},{"lineNumber":92078,"originalJapaneseLine":"　意外だ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"That's surprising..."},{"lineNumber":92079,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あら、日光さんはそれが素よ」","translatedEnglishLine":"Oh, that's just how Hikkou-san is."},{"lineNumber":92080,"originalJapaneseLine":"「パッと見は冷血漢に見えるし……","translatedEnglishLine":"At first glance, he looks like a cold-blooded man..."},{"lineNumber":92081,"originalJapaneseLine":"　本人も必要とあらばそうあろうとするが……」","translatedEnglishLine":"He tries to be that way when necessary, but..."},{"lineNumber":92082,"originalJapaneseLine":"「超のつくお人好しだからのー、あれは。","translatedEnglishLine":"He's extremely kind-hearted, you know."},{"lineNumber":92083,"originalJapaneseLine":"　儂らも昔、それで苦労させられたもんだ」","translatedEnglishLine":"We ourselves had troubles because of that in the past."},{"lineNumber":92084,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ま、見てたら分からんでもないがな」","translatedEnglishLine":"Well, if you watch him, it's not that hard to understand."},{"lineNumber":92085,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そうよね……二人とも良い子だもん……」","translatedEnglishLine":"That's right... both of them are good kids..."},{"lineNumber":92086,"originalJapaneseLine":"「それがたまたま運が悪かったせいで、","translatedEnglishLine":"But just because of bad luck,"},{"lineNumber":92087,"originalJapaneseLine":"　魔王として恐れられて","translatedEnglishLine":"they were feared as Demon Lords,"},{"lineNumber":92088,"originalJapaneseLine":"　不幸な運命の渦中にいて……」","translatedEnglishLine":"caught in the whirlpool of an unfortunate fate..."},{"lineNumber":92089,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ま、いかにもあいつが","translatedEnglishLine":"Well, those two are exactly the type"},{"lineNumber":92090,"originalJapaneseLine":"　意固地になるタイプの子らだ」","translatedEnglishLine":"who would become stubborn like that."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ずっと思っていたのですが……」
「私達はゼスに向かう筈なのに……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We were supposed to head to Zeth...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ここ、ヘルマンですね」
「あれ、本当だ！？」
「ゼスと間違えて、
ヘルマン来ちゃった？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and ended up coming to Helman?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お城の食堂でパーティーメンバーが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The party members were in the castle's dining hall,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 食事を取っていた。
「んぐんぐ、もぐもぐ、
美味しーね、日光さん」
「美樹ちゃん、
食べながら喋るのは下品ですよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: it's rude to talk while eating.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あ、んぐんぐ」
「そうだ、美樹ちゃん。
ご飯食べたら街の方に行ってみない？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: After we finish eating, shall we go to the town?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うん、行くー。
それで健太郎くんの新しいタオル買おうね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Then let's buy Kentarou-kun a new towel.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「新しいタオル？　もう間に合ってるよ？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A new towel? I already have enough, you know?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うぅん、違うの違うの。
ねずみさんのプリントされたタオルがあったの。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There was a towel printed with a mouse.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そろそろ十二支揃うよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'm about to complete the whole zodiac set.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「お、本当だ。
じゃあ絶対に買いに行かないと」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Then I definitely have to go buy it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「二人とも、お喋りもいいですが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Both of you, chatting is fine, but

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ご飯が冷めてしまいますよ」
「あ、はーい」
「くすくす、楽しみだね」
「うんっ、そうだね」
「まったく……」
美樹と健太郎の二人を見て、
そっと日光は口元を緩めていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hikkou gently relaxed the corners of his mouth.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うん？　どうしたの、ランス君」
「や、日光さんが優しい顔をしていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Well, Hikkou-san had a kind expression.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 意外だ……」
「あら、日光さんはそれが素よ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Oh, that's just how Hikkou-san is.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「パッと見は冷血漢に見えるし……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At first glance, he looks like a cold-blooded man...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 本人も必要とあらばそうあろうとするが……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He tries to be that way when necessary, but...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「超のつくお人好しだからのー、あれは。
儂らも昔、それで苦労させられたもんだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We ourselves had troubles because of that in the past.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ま、見てたら分からんでもないがな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Well, if you watch him, it's not that hard to understand.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そうよね……二人とも良い子だもん……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That's right... both of them are good kids...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それがたまたま運が悪かったせいで、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But just because of bad luck,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔王として恐れられて
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: they were feared as Demon Lords,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 不幸な運命の渦中にいて……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: caught in the whirlpool of an unfortunate fate...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ま、いかにもあいつが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Well, those two are exactly the type

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 意固地になるタイプの子らだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: who would become stubborn like that.

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

「私達はゼスに向かう筈なのに……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We were supposed to head to Zeth...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ここ、ヘルマンですね」
「あれ、本当だ！？」
「ゼスと間違えて、
ヘルマン来ちゃった？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and ended up coming to Helman?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お城の食堂でパーティーメンバーが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The party members were in the castle's dining hall,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 食事を取っていた。
「んぐんぐ、もぐもぐ、
美味しーね、日光さん」
「美樹ちゃん、
食べながら喋るのは下品ですよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: it's rude to talk while eating.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あ、んぐんぐ」
「そうだ、美樹ちゃん。
ご飯食べたら街の方に行ってみない？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: After we finish eating, shall we go to the town?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うん、行くー。
それで健太郎くんの新しいタオル買おうね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Then let's buy Kentarou-kun a new towel.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「新しいタオル？　もう間に合ってるよ？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A new towel? I already have enough, you know?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うぅん、違うの違うの。
ねずみさんのプリントされたタオルがあったの。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There was a towel printed with a mouse.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そろそろ十二支揃うよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'm about to complete the whole zodiac set.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「お、本当だ。
じゃあ絶対に買いに行かないと」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Then I definitely have to go buy it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「二人とも、お喋りもいいですが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Both of you, chatting is fine, but

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ご飯が冷めてしまいますよ」
「あ、はーい」
「くすくす、楽しみだね」
「うんっ、そうだね」
「まったく……」
美樹と健太郎の二人を見て、
そっと日光は口元を緩めていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hikkou gently relaxed the corners of his mouth.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うん？　どうしたの、ランス君」
「や、日光さんが優しい顔をしていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Well, Hikkou-san had a kind expression.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 意外だ……」
「あら、日光さんはそれが素よ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Oh, that's just how Hikkou-san is.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「パッと見は冷血漢に見えるし……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At first glance, he looks like a cold-blooded man...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 本人も必要とあらばそうあろうとするが……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He tries to be that way when necessary, but...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「超のつくお人好しだからのー、あれは。
儂らも昔、それで苦労させられたもんだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We ourselves had troubles because of that in the past.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ま、見てたら分からんでもないがな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Well, if you watch him, it's not that hard to understand.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そうよね……二人とも良い子だもん……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That's right... both of them are good kids...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それがたまたま運が悪かったせいで、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But just because of bad luck,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔王として恐れられて
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: they were feared as Demon Lords,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 不幸な運命の渦中にいて……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: caught in the whirlpool of an unfortunate fate...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ま、いかにもあいつが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Well, those two are exactly the type

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 意固地になるタイプの子らだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: who would become stubborn like that.
